item.title: Fridge dumped outside vacant shop, 1st November
item.description:
The council wheelie bins have been positioned to hide the dumped fridge - the shop and flat above have been vacant for some time. The wheelie bins are also a nuisance constantly blowing over in wind - makes the area a target for further waste to be dumped
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 98A, Wickham Street, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous unkept Road, 1st November
item.description:
This is an ongoing issue that happens every year, the road and pavement have become dangerously littered by the unkept trees that apparently belonged to nobody. It is a danger to walk on and there are children and elderly that live down this road which is also on a hill. This needs to be cleaned yesterday.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Station Estate, Elmers End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead tree causing fungus to spread all along pavement outside 96 Murray Ave, 1st November
item.description:
There is a tree outside 96 Murray Avenue that looks dead and has a series of really large fungus growing around it, which have spread over the pavement. They seem to be getting more and more out of control.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Murray Avenue, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light No.3 outside Victoria House coffee, 1st November
item.description:
Ref: 8333298. I have now reported this particular light twicelast week and both times it has been reported as "repaired" this was a photo taken just today and it clearly has not been repaired. Please get it repaired urgently and looked at properly as this area is a hotspot for ASB. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Coptic Street, Bloomsbury, London
Report on FixMyStreet
